definition: to stir-fry rapidly using a high flame/to conduct a media blitz/to manipulate a stock market through large-scale buying and selling
to explode or burst/to quick fry or quick boil
to sauté/to stir-fry/to speculate/to hype/to fire (sb)

sentences.english: Heat 3 tbsps oil in wok, saute giblets until cooked. Remove.
sentences.chinese: 燒3湯匙油，爆炒腎片至熟透，取起。

sentences.english: Heat 2 tbsps oil in wok, stir-fry chicken until cooked. Remove.
sentences.chinese: 燒2湯匙油，爆炒雞肉至熟透，取出。

sentences.english: All cooks need to know how to saut é.
sentences.chinese: 所有的廚師都需要知道如何爆炒。

sentences.english: But the fact is stir-fried is a very healthy cooking methods.
sentences.chinese: 但事實上爆炒是一種很不衛生的烹製方法。

sentences.english: The fourth dish, stewed beef father is made of method for a while.
sentences.chinese: 第四道菜，紅燒牛肉爸爸是用爆炒法做的。

definition: to sauté/to stir-fry/to speculate/to hype/to fire (sb)
to stir-fry with oil only (no addition of water)
pork chop/pork cutlet/spare ribs/(coll.) skinny person
to cook in a covered vessel/to casserole/to stew
to stir-fry before broiling or stewing
